ygData.subject: Re: What to solo at level 27
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Funny how different it is on different servers. I never saw much good casual grouping happen on Tarrew Marr for the Unrest basement, but Cazic was always
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, Oct 27/99, Rokenn Swiftsong <rokenn@...> wrote:
> From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
> Doh! I relized that right after I sent it, LOL. But the basement is still a
> good spot as I never had to wait more then 30 mins to get into a group that
> would last for the rest of the night. It is a great place for casual
> grouping, and it is nearly impossible to die there :)

Funny how different it is on different servers. I never saw much good
casual grouping happen on Tarrew Marr for the Unrest basement, but Cazic
was always great for it. I guess it also depends when you play. When I
wasn't working I'd log in in the day time and usually there'd only be 4
or 5 people in Cazic so it made sense to group. Was also fun because we
ended up with some very weird combo groups then, composed of whoever
happened to be there. That made it fun for me because I could try
different song combos to see what was more effective for these weird
class groupings.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
